headerDisplay: Homebridge plugin for Mitsubishi heat pumps using Kumo Cloud v3 API.
footerDisplay: For help and support, visit the [GitHub repository](https://github.com/burtherman/homebridge-mitsubishi-comfort).

pollInterval.title: Poll Interval (seconds)
pollInterval.description: Polling interval when streaming is healthy (minimum 5 seconds, default 30)

disablePolling.title: Disable Polling
disablePolling.description: Disable polling when streaming is healthy (will auto-enable if streaming fails)

debug.title: Debug Mode
debug.description: Enable verbose debug logging (requires running Homebridge with -D flag)

excludeDevices.title: Hide Device IDs

items.title: Device Serial Number
items.description: Enter device serial number to hide

excludeDevices.description: Device serial numbers to hide from HomeKit (found in logs during device discovery)

streamingHealthCheckInterval.title: Streaming Health Check Interval (seconds)
streamingHealthCheckInterval.description: How often to check if streaming is healthy (default: 30 seconds)

streamingStaleThreshold.title: Streaming Stale Threshold (seconds)
streamingStaleThreshold.description: Consider streaming stale if no updates received for this long (default: 60 seconds)

degradedPollInterval.title: Degraded Mode Poll Interval (seconds)
degradedPollInterval.description: Fast polling interval when streaming is unhealthy (default: 10 seconds)
